tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_audit_documentation (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_date DATE,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100),
  inspection_type VARCHAR(50),
  inspection_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audits (
  audit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_date DATE,
  audit_type VARCHAR(50),
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100),
  audit_result VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  inspection_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspected_entity VARCHAR(100),
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100),
  inspection_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audits (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    audit_result VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_result VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(100),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_records (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    audit_type VARCHAR(50),
    audit_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_records (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_type VARCHAR(50),
    inspection_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE audit_findings (
    finding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT,
    finding_description TEXT,
    action_taken TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_audit_id FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES audit_records(audit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_findings (
    finding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_id INT,
    finding_description TEXT,
    action_taken TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_inspection_id FOREIGN KEY (inspection_id) REFERENCES inspection_records(inspection_id)
);
